message.content:
cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.NE 

The paper discusses reinforcement learning and optimal control theory, which are both subfields of machine learning and robotics. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also specifically focuses on the linear quadratic regulator, which is a control theory problem, making cs.SY (Systems and Control) another likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses computational and statistical properties, which could fall under cs.RO (Robotics) or cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, since the paper deals with optimization and convergence, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is also a possible sub-category.
